title: Heavenly Bliss
description: Will Jill Carey hired Kyle Randall to help her restore Bliss House, she delighted its two resident ghosts, Laura Randall and Cyrus Bliss. Murdered because of their illicit love, they could only enter heaven if one of their descendants married and returned to Bliss House. But, even though Jill and Kyle are desperately in love, marriage is the furthest thing from their minds.
author: Sara Jarrod
